sections.body: Heavier leg armor pieces slow down their wearers and provide higher armor check penalties, but are less restrictive to spellcasters than heavier arm armor pieces.
These overlapping strips of metal on leather usually take the form of leggings or a skirt.
sections.name: Banded Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Banded Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: A chain leg piece takes the form of a long skirt made of chainmail that is further protected by steel greaves, or individual leggings of tighter-fitting chain reinforced by padding, steel kneeplates, and leather straps.
sections.name: Chain Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Chain Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece consists of leggings or a skirt made of the tanned and preserved skin of a thick-skinned beast.
sections.name: Hide Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Hide Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: These leggings are constructed of a number of horn plates laced together in parallel rows and reinforced with leather. Sometimes they take the form of a skirt made of such material. When in skirt form, the legs are further protected by leather greaves reinforced by horn.
sections.name: Horn Lamellar Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Horn Lamellar Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: These leggings are constructed of a number of iron plates laced together in parallel rows and reinforced with chainmail. Sometimes they take the form of a skirt. The legs are further protected by leather greaves reinforced with iron.
sections.name: Iron Lamellar Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Iron Lamellar Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This leg armor piece is usually constructed of a leather skirt reinforced by hexagonal plates made from iron, and the legs are further protected by leather greaves reinforced with steel. Some versions of this leg armor piece consist of individual leather leggings reinforced by hexagonal plates.
sections.name: Kikko Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Kikko Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece is constructed of light lamellar thigh guards and quilted cloth or leather leggings.
sections.name: Kusari Gusoku Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Kusari Gusoku Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This leg armor piece is constructed of a number of discrete hard-boiled leather plates laced together in parallel rows. They can take the form of a skirt or leggings.
sections.name: Leather Lamellar Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Leather Lamellar Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece consists of leggings or a skirt constructed of hard-boiled leather carefully sewn together.
sections.name: Leather Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Leather Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: The protection of this leg armor piece usually takes the form of a long skirt constructed of many interlocking pieces of steel riveted onto cloth, along with heavy cloth or leather greaves reinforced with steel plates. Some versions are made into individual leggings.
sections.name: Mountain Pattern Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Mountain Pattern Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece consists of steel lamellar thigh guards and leggings made of metal reinforced with leather and cloth.
sections.name: O-Yoroi Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/O-Yoroi Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece consists of leggings or a skirt made of heavy or quilted cloth.
sections.name: Padded Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Padded Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: A plate leg armor piece is composed of faulds, tassets, cuisses, poleyns, and greaves along with bits of chainmail and padded armor for extra support and protection.
sections.name: Plate Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Plate Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: These are leggings made of heavy quilted cloth. When worn alone, or with only other quilted cloth pieces, you gain DR 3/— against ranged piercing weapons.
sections.name: Quilted Cloth Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Quilted Cloth Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: Typically a scale leg piece is a skirt of overlapping metal plates and leather greaves reinforced with steel plates. Some suits feature long leggings of overlapping metal plates instead.
sections.name: Scale Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Scale Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: These thigh guards and leggings are constructed of metal strips and chainmail.
sections.name: Splint Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Splint Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece consists of thigh guards and leggings or a skirt constructed of steel plates laced together in parallel rows.
sections.name: Steel Lamellar Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Steel Lamellar Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: These leggings are constructed of hard-boiled leather carefully sewn together and reinforced with metal studs.
sections.name: Studded Leather Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Studded Leather Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece is constructed of light lamellar thigh guards and leggings.
sections.name: Tatami-Do Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Tatami-Do Leg Armor Piece

sections.body: This armor piece consists of a pair of leggings or a skirt constructed of fire-treated wood sewn over leather.
sections.name: Wooden Leg Armor Piece
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Wooden Leg Armor Piece
